name: David Ramirez
text: I imagine there are some stores here that might let you preorder.    The price difference isn't surprising--the  Kinect hardware is probably really pricey. The used games/sharing issue is something that doesn't cost them to avoid, just leaving it up to the publishers. Not forcing 24 hour check-ins is also not complicated.    But yes, it says something that the X-Box team messed up so badly that *the lack* of something on the Playstation counts as desirable features  =P
